remarks: A bound on the distance of the sum ` sum_ n <_ x ( 1 / sqrt n ) ` from its asymptotic value ` 2 sqrt x + L ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2016.)
statement:
divsqrtsum.2 $e |- F = ( x e. RR+ |-> ( sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ( 1 / ( sqrt ` n ) ) - ( 2 x. ( sqrt ` x ) ) ) ) $.
divsqrsum2.1 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~>r L ) $.
divsqrtsum2 $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. RR+ ) -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` A ) - L ) ) <_ ( 1 / ( sqrt ` A ) ) ) $.
$d A n x $.
$d n ph $.
